chunk_text: The Commission, therefore, proposes to mobilise an amount of EUR 25 937 813. (4) The EGF should, therefore, be mobilised in order to provide a financial contribution for the application submitted by France, HAVE ADOPTED THIS DECISION: Article 1 For the general budget of the European Union for the financial year 2014, the European Globalisation Adjustment Fund shall be mobilised to provide the sum of EUR 25 937 813 in commitment and payment appropriations. Article 2 This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union. Done at Strasbourg, 17 December 2014. For the European Parliament The President M. SCHULZ For the Council The President B. DELLA VEDOVA (1) OJ L 406, 30.12.2006, p. 1. (2) OJ L 347, 20.12.2013, p. 855. (3) OJ L 347, 20.12.2013, p. 884. (4) OJ C 373, 20.12.2013, p. 1.
